name: Blast Royale
description: Blast Royale is a mobile top down Battle Royale game for the web3 generation! We're going to onboard the next billion players onto the blockchain through FUN! By owning NOOBs, we are all going to become PROs. A game for gamers, by gamers, owned by gamers. We bring high-quality, fun experiences to the blockchain and to help gather mainstream web3 adoption. Players fully own their own assets and can actively participate in the game ecosystem.
